hooks.prompt: Check if in this conversation any agent analysis was completed (wrote to docs/<agent>.md) or demos were created/modified. If so, check whether agents.yaml status was updated accordingly (e.g. from 'pending' to 'in-progress' or 'done'). If it was NOT updated but should have been, respond {"ok": false, "reason": "agents.yaml status not updated for <agent>. Please update it."}. Otherwise respond {"ok": true}.
